# Spring Data JPA 开始

# 初始化spring boot项目

初始化项目starter，添加jpa、mysql-connector

		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
			<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>mysql</groupId>
			<artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
			<scope>runtime</scope>
		</dependency>

# application配置文件

配置datasource和jpa

spring:
  datasource:
    url: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/demojpa?characterEncoding=UTF-8
    username: root
    password: root
  jpa:
    database: mysql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: update

# Entity层

使用Lombok精简代码，但是你必须明白Lombok每个注解干了什么

@Entity
@Setter
@Getter
public class UserEntity {

    @Id
    private String username;
    private String password;
    private String nickname;

}

# DAO层

我们UserDao接口直接集成JpaRepository，默认就能完成增删改查

package pro.ctao.demojpa.dao;

import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;

import pro.ctao.demojpa.entity.UserEntity;

public interface UserDao extends JpaRepository<UserEntity, String>  {
    
}

# 测试代码

@SpringBootTest
class DemojpaApplicationTests {

	@Resource
	private UserDao userDao;

	@Test
	void userDaoTest() {
		UserEntity userEntity =  new UserEntity();
		userEntity.setUsername("pro");
		userEntity.setPassword("123123");
		userEntity.setNickname("nickname");
        
        userDao.save(userEntity);
    }
}

# MySQL数据库

执行完上面的代码，接下来看看数据库发生了什么

在数据库demojpa中，生成了一张表user_entity

/*表： user_entity*/--------------------

/*列信息*/-----------

Field     Type          Collation        Null    Key     Default  Extra   Privileges                       Comment  
--------  ------------  ---------------  ------  ------  -------  ------  -------------------------------  ---------
username  varchar(255)  utf8_general_ci  NO      PRI     (NULL)           select,insert,update,references           
nickname  varchar(255)  utf8_general_ci  YES             (NULL)           select,insert,update,references           
password  varchar(255)  utf8_general_ci  YES             (NULL)           select,insert,update,references

我们可以看到表数据，正式测试程序保存的

username  nickname  password  
--------  --------  ----------
pro       nickname  123123

Spring Data JPA 映射
